price: 40. Mpe epayi na biso akozala na esika ya likolo oyo esika malamu ya kozonga.
arabic: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin
